Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Directing the state board of real property tax services to conduct a study on real property tax saturation
Summary: Relates to directing the state board of real property tax services to conduct a study on real property tax saturation.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the state board of real property tax services to conduct a study on real property tax saturation; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
